text: Suppose biologists counted the rabbits in Australia in the years after English settlers introduced them. If the population is growing exponentially, the biologists might have collected data like those shown in the table.

An assistant to the biologists used the table to write an equation for the rabbit population p for any year n after the biologists first counted the rabbits. He used the equation to make predictions.

  • What equation did he write? Explain what information you used to write the equation.
  • How many rabbits will there be after 10 years? 25 years? After 50 years?
  • In how many years will the rabbit population exceed 1 x 10curriculum/ggg/images/screenshot-2025-01-11-at-1.21.55 pm.png?
